title: Provides for the payment of the salary, wages, medical and hospital expenses of any city of Yonkers detention officer injured in the line of duty
summary: Provides for the payment of the salary, wages, medical and hospital expenses of any city of Yonkers detention officer injured or becoming ill in the line of duty.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to disability coverage for detention officers employed by the city of Yonkers
